title: add to_static for electra-gen
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Others
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
- https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/community/pull/751

## 为 electra-gen模型训练接入动转静

**训练环境**

  ```shell
  cd model_zoo/ernie-gen
  wget --no-check-certificate https://bj.bcebos.com/paddlenlp/datasets/poetry.tar.gz
  tar xvf poetry.tar.gz
  ```

**训练结果**
- 动态图

  运行命令
  ```shell
  python -u ./train.py \
    --model_name_or_path ernie-1.0 \
    --max_encode_len 24 \
    --max_decode_len 72 \
    --batch_size 48  \
    --learning_rate 2e-5 \
    --num_epochs 12 \
    --logging_steps 1 \
    --save_steps 1000 \
    --output_dir ./tmp/ \
    --device gpu
  ```
  ✅运行结果
  
![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/99723454/2111531d-1ed0-4a40-99c1-0ba5d0204893)


- 静态图 SOT模式
  运行命令
  ```shell
  export GRAPH_SIZE=0 COST_MODEL=False ENABLE_FALL_BACK=True
  python -u ./train.py \
    --model_name_or_path ernie-1.0 \
    --max_encode_len 24 \
    --max_decode_len 72 \
    --batch_size 48  \
    --learning_rate 2e-5 \
    --num_epochs 12 \
    --logging_steps 1 \
    --save_steps 1000 \
    --output_dir ./tmp/ \
    --device gpu \
    --to_static True
  ```
  ❌运行报错


- 静态图 AST模式
   运行命令
  ```shell
  export COST_MODEL=False ENABLE_FALL_BACK=False
  python -u ./train.py \
    --model_name_or_path ernie-1.0 \
    --max_encode_len 24 \
    --max_decode_len 72 \
    --batch_size 48  \
    --learning_rate 2e-5 \
    --num_epochs 12 \
    --logging_steps 1 \
    --save_steps 1000 \
    --output_dir ./tmp/ \
    --device gpu \
    --to_static True
  ```
  ✅运行结果
![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/99723454/3a8e970f-b16c-45c7-9cba-47a0bf0029b3)
speed: 0.18 step/s，比动态图慢很多

body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Performance optimization

### PR changes
Others

### Description
Since `paddle.outer` is composed of `matmul`, and `matmul` is added to amp_white_list. When the two inputs are `float32` dtype, the calculation is still under amp, which may cause loss of accuracy.

title: [Bug]: 混合精度类型提升不符合预期
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle:
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 
- paddlenlp:
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

```Markdown
类型提升不符合预期
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

```python
import paddle

print(paddle.version.commit)

a = paddle.ones([1], dtype="float32")

with paddle.amp.auto_cast(enable=True, custom_white_list=None, custom_black_list=None, level='O2', dtype='float16', use_promote=True):
    o = paddle.outer(a, a)
    b = paddle.matmul(a, a)
    c = a * a
    d = a - a

print(o.dtype)
print(b.dtype)
print(c.dtype)
print(d.dtype)

print("\n")

with paddle.amp.auto_cast(enable=True, custom_white_list=None, custom_black_list=None, level='O2', dtype='float16', use_promote=False):
    o = paddle.outer(a, a)
    b = paddle.matmul(a, a)
    c = a * a
    d = a - a

print(o.dtype)
print(b.dtype)
print(c.dtype)
print(d.dtype)
```

title: MP2-PP2 hack shared layer to non-sharded layer to Step Alignment
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Others
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
MP2-PP2与MP2无法做到逐位对齐，原因是MP使用了共享Embedding层，共享层需要使用梯度累加，MP的梯度累加是使用加法来实现的，而PP由于跨卡，因此共享层的梯度同步是使用通信来完成的，具体的操作是Allreduce。这个PR将共享层hack成非共享层，来实验MP2-PP2与MP2的逐位对齐，目的是为了验证Allreduce和加法实现的梯度累加本身就存在diff，因此无法做到完全逐位对齐。一定要注意要注释掉self.tie_weights()这一行代码，这一行手动绑定了两个层作为共享层

title: Add unified checkpoint config
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Add unified checkpoint config
Configs to unify hybrid parallel checkpoint. Following options are supports:

- [ ]   ignore_data_type_error: ignore the data type and convert to fp16, bf16 or fp32
- [x]   ignore_save_model_weight: do not save model weight when the master weight exits
- [x]   master_weight_compatible:
        1. if the master weight exits, only load when needed
        2. if master weight does not exit, convert model weight to master weight when needed
- [x]   checkpoint_compatible: enable loading old checkpoints, new checkpoint will be saved with aunified checkpoint type
- [x]   async_save_to_disk: enable asynchronous saving checkpoints to disk
- [x]   enable_all_options: enable all optimization configurations

请提出你的问题
[https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/model_zoo/taskflow.md#%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E6%8A%BD%E5%8F%96这个任务，能够和https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/model_zoo/taskflow.md#%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%8D%E5%85%B8-2这个任务一样，自定义词典抽取NER。](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/model_zoo/taskflow.md#%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E6%8A%BD%E5%8F%96%E8%BF%99%E4%B8%AA%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%EF%BC%8C%E8%83%BD%E5%A4%9F%E5%92%8Chttps://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/model_zoo/taskflow.md#%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%8D%E5%85%B8-2%E8%BF%99%E4%B8%AA%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%80%E6%A0%B7%EF%BC%8C%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%8D%E5%85%B8%E6%8A%BD%E5%8F%96NER%E3%80%82)
比如：

schema = ['手机年款','手机品牌','机型'] # Define the schema for entity extraction

输出结果能把08年作为手机年款的输出吗？

title: Set flash_attn mask to None in LlamaPretrainedModelAuto
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Others

### PR changes
Others

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Llama预训练模型通过`is_casual_mask`函数判断flash_attn的`attention_mask`参数，这在组网中引入了控制流操作，导致静半新IR无法跑通（新IR控制流机制正在支持中...）。
由于预训练场景下并不需要`attention_mask`，相关判断逻辑是冗余的，本PR临时修改组网，直接将`attention_mask`设置为`None`，以在组网中消除控制流操作。
